column2: India. Most of its people depend on farming and business. This city is surrounded by three lakes and two small rivers. Famous Hindu Temple  Chandi Mata  is situated in chicholi tehsil. Famous  Bhoot Mela   (Ghost Fair) at malajpur village is just 7 km away from the chicholi. Wheat maze soyabean are the main crops of the town. Average rainfall of the chicholi is 1053mm per year.
